storage.label: Storage
storage.invalid: Yezichak is using an indeterminate amount of storage.

persistent.label: Persistent storage
persistent.description: Enable to help prevent the browser from unexpectedly clearing the database.
persistent.descriptionMore: Web browsers will sometimes clear stored data if the device is running low on storage space. This can result in the imported dictionaries being deleted unexpectedly, causing Yezichak to stop functioning. Enabling persistent storage tells the browser that the data should not be deleted in those circumstances.

freqSort.label: Frequency sorting dictionary
freqSort.description: Sort results using a frequency dictionary.
freqSort.descriptionMore: Enabling this option will sort search results using a specific dictionary. This can be beneficial when using multiple dictionaries which may not have consistent sorting information.

key.label: Scan modifier key
key.description: Hold a key while moving the cursor to scan text.

middleMouse.label: Scan using middle mouse button
middleMouse.description: Hold the middle mouse button while moving the cursor to scan text.

autoHide.label: Auto-hide search popup
autoHide.description: When no definitions are found after scanning text, the popup will be hidden.

cursorHide.label: Hide search popup on cursor exit
cursorHide.description: When the cursor exits the popup, the popup will be hidden.

scanDelay.label: Scan delay
scanDelay.description: Change the delay before scanning occurs when no modifier key is required.

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Adjust the style of the popup.

actionBar.label: Action bar appearance
actionBar.description: Control when and where the action bar is visible.

displayMode.label: Display mode
displayMode.description: Change the layout of the popup.

scale.label: Scale
scale.description: Control the scaling factor of the popup.

size.label: Size
size.description: Control the size of the window, in pixels.

enable.label: Enable audio playback for terms
enable.description: Show a clickable speaker icon next to search results.

background.label: Enable background clipboard text monitoring
background.description: Open the search page in a new window when the clipboard contains text.

search.label: Enable search page clipboard text monitoring
search.description: The query on the search page will be automatically updated with text in the clipboard.

settings.explanation: Yezichak can import and export settings files which can be used to restore settings, share settings across devices, and to help to debug problems. These files will only contain settings and will not contain dictionaries. Dictionaries must be imported separately. However, you can also import a previously exported collection of dictionaries. See the next section about that.

dictionaries.explanation: You can try to export the entire collection of your dictionaries into a single large file that you can try to import from other browsers or devices. Importing the collection like that is a destructive operation and will replace your current database of dictionaries so please proceed with caution. These operations can take a lot of time depending on the size of your collection, especially at the start and at the end, so have patience.
